title: Battlefield 4 [MULTI5][ALL UPDATES][DLC CHINA RISING][RELOADED]
description:
IMPORTANT: All UPDATES and DLC to date 12/04/2013.. Battlefield 4 is the blockbuster that redefines the action genre, created from moments that blur the line between a game of glory. Fueled by the power and faithfulness of next generation Frostbite 3 Battlefield 4 provides a visceral and dramatic experience like no other. Only in Battlefield can demolish buildings that protect your enemy. Only in Battlefield you'll lead an assault from the rear of a patrol vehicle. Battlefield gives you the freedom to do more and be more, while you take advantage of your strengths and you battle your way to victory. Besides the seal of his multiplayer, Battlefield 4 presents an intense and dramatic campaign focused on the characters, beginning with the evacuation of important American personalities Shanghai and follows the efforts of your squad to bring back home. There is nothing comparable. Immerse yourself in the glorious chaos of total war, only Battlefield.
